definition[0]: a piece of equipment used to lift a heavy weight off the ground, such as a car, and support it while it is in the air
definition[1]: a card used in card games that has a man’s picture on it and is worth less than a queen and more than a ten
definition[2]: an electronic connection for a telephone or other electric machine
definition[3]: a children’s game in which the players try to pick up small objects called jacks while bouncing and catching a ball
definition[4]: a small metal or plastic object that has six points, used in this game
definition[5]: a small white ball at which players aim larger balls in the game of bowls
